description.en:
Peter Pan’s Neverland…is a land of fiction, but in this world, people will float into the sky when they feel happy or excited. But just one person, Fuji, is unable to fly into the sky freely. If he were to fly, his feelings for his friend, Nanao, would be discovered. Fuji does his best to control his body so it doesn’t float, but Nanao, always his happy, floating self, comes to visit Fuji...

Aside from the persistent love story between friends, "I Can’t Fly!", there’s also the Hairdresser x Crossdresser love story that starts with an affair, "Today’s a Lucky Day", and "Wailing Cinema", a heartrending love story about a friend from college that suddenly appears before you as a ghost. Ranging from a lively love comedy to a bittersweet unrequited love, it’s the appealing Volume 1â˜…
